Definite integration

When dealing with definite integrals the relevant formula is as follows:

Key Point

Integration by Parts for Definite Integrals

For definite integrals, given functions \(f(x)\) and \(g(x)\):

\({\displaystyle\int_a^b f \cdot g \phantom{1} \mathrm{d}x}\) = \(\left[f \cdot {\displaystyle\int g \phantom{1} \mathrm{d}x}\right]_a^b - {\displaystyle\int_a^b \left(\dfrac{df}{dx} \displaystyle\int g \phantom{1} \mathrm{d}x \right)\mathrm{d}x}\)

Alternatively, given functions \(u\) and \(v\):

\({\displaystyle \int_a^b u\dfrac{d v}{d x}\mathrm{d}x = \left[\phantom{\dfrac{1}{1}}\!\!\!u.v\right]_a^b-\displaystyle \int_a^b v\dfrac{d u}{d x} \mathrm{d}x}\)

Example

Find \({\displaystyle\int_0^2 x e^x\mathrm{d}x}\)

Solution

We let \(f = x\) and \(g = e^x\). Then \(\dfrac{df}{dx} = 1\) and \({\displaystyle\int g \phantom{.} \mathrm{d}x} = e^x\). Using integration by parts we obtain

\({\displaystyle\int_0^2 x e^x\mathrm{d}x}\) = \(\left[\phantom{\dfrac{1}{1}}\!\!\! x e^x\right]_0^2 - {\displaystyle\int_0^2 1 . e^x\mathrm{d}x} = 2 e^2 - \left[\phantom{\dfrac{1}{1}}\!\!\!e^x\right]_0^2 = 2 e^2 - [e^2 - 1]= e^2 +1\)

(or 8.389 to 3 d.p.)

Example

Find \({\displaystyle\int_0^{\frac{\pi}{4}}(4-3x)\sin x\mathrm{d}x}\).

Solution

Take \(f = 4-3x\) and \(g = \sin(x)\) and complete the integral:

\begin{eqnarray*} \int_0^{\frac{\pi}{4}} (4-3x)\sin x\,dx &=& \left[\phantom{\dfrac{1}{1}}\!\!\!(4-3x)(-\cos x)\right]_0^{\frac{\pi}{4}}-3\int_0^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \cos x\, dx\\ &=& \left[\phantom{\dfrac{1}{1}}\!\!\!(4-3x)(-\cos x)\right]_0^{\frac{\pi}{4}}-3\left[\phantom{\dfrac{1}{1}}\!\!\!\sin x\right]_0^{\frac{\pi}{4}}\\ &=& 0.716 \phantom{1}(3\phantom{1}d.p.) \end{eqnarray*}

Bestemt integrasjon

Når vi regner bestemte integraler brukes følgende formel:

Kort fortalt

Delvis integrasjon for Bestemte integraler

For bestemte integral, gitt funksjonene \(f(x)\) og \(g(x)\):

\({\displaystyle\int_a^b f \cdot g \phantom{1} \mathrm{d}x}\) = \(\left[f \cdot {\displaystyle\int g \phantom{1} \mathrm{d}x}\right]_a^b - {\displaystyle\int_a^b \left(\dfrac{df}{dx} \displaystyle\int g \phantom{1} \mathrm{d}x \right)\mathrm{d}x}\)

Alternativt, gitt funksjoner \(u\) og \(v\):

\({\displaystyle \int_a^b u\dfrac{d v}{d x}\mathrm{d}x = \left[\phantom{\dfrac{1}{1}}\!\!\!u.v\right]_a^b-\displaystyle \int_a^b v\dfrac{d u}{d x} \mathrm{d}x}\)

Eksempel

Finn \({\displaystyle\int_0^2 x e^x\mathrm{d}x}\)

Løsning

Vi velger \(f = x\) og \(g = e^x\). Da blir \(\dfrac{df}{dx} = 1\) og \({\displaystyle\int g \phantom{.} \mathrm{d}x} = e^x\). Med delvis integrasjon får vi

\({\displaystyle\int_0^2 x e^x\mathrm{d}x}\) = \(\left[\phantom{\dfrac{1}{1}}\!\!\! x e^x\right]_0^2 - {\displaystyle\int_0^2 1 . e^x\mathrm{d}x} = 2 e^2 - \left[\phantom{\dfrac{1}{1}}\!\!\!e^x\right]_0^2 = 2 e^2 - [e^2 - 1]= e^2 +1\)

(eller 8.389 til 3 gjeldende siffer)

Eksempel

Finn \({\displaystyle\int_0^{\frac{\pi}{4}}(4-3x)\sin x\mathrm{d}x}\).

Løsning

La \(f = 4-3x\) og \(g = \sin(x)\) og integrer:

\begin{eqnarray*} \int_0^{\frac{\pi}{4}} (4-3x)\sin x\,dx &=& \left[\phantom{\dfrac{1}{1}}\!\!\!(4-3x)(-\cos x)\right]_0^{\frac{\pi}{4}}-3\int_0^{\frac{\pi}{4}} \cos x\, dx\\ &=& \left[\phantom{\dfrac{1}{1}}\!\!\!(4-3x)(-\cos x)\right]_0^{\frac{\pi}{4}}-3\left[\phantom{\dfrac{1}{1}}\!\!\!\sin x\right]_0^{\frac{\pi}{4}}\\ &=& 0.716 \phantom{1}(3\phantom{1}d.p.) \end{eqnarray*}
